item.title: S01E01 - Remote Work
item.description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to work away from a tall office building in a large metropolist? Courtny and Den dive into this topic and more!
You can also listen to the audio directly:

About The Work Item is a show hosted by Courtny Cotten and Den Delimarsky, discussing the intricacies of product design and development, working with people and building experiences that delight customers. Every episode goes
